DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Fissure Sealants Bonded With Different Universal Adhesives
DOC.detailed_description: Sealants place previously unseal , caries-free permanent first molars , employ split-mouth design . 100 patient include study . The teeth randomized eight group accord adhesive system mode place test resin-based sealant . Group1 : Acid-Etch + Fissure sealant ( ClinPro 3M ESPE , U.S. ) ( Control arm ) Group2 : All Bond Universal ( Bisco Inc. , Schaumburg , IL , U.S. ) - self etch technique + Fissure sealant ; Group3 : All Bond Universal - total etch technique + Fissure sealant Group4 : Scotchbond ( Single Bond ) Universal ( 3M ESPE , U.S. ) - self etch technique + Fissure sealant Group5 : Scotchbond ( Single Bond ) Universal - total etch technique + Fissure sealant Group6 : Clearfil Universal Bond ( Kuraray , Tokyo , Japan ) - self etch technique + Fissure sealant Group7 : Clearfil Universal Bond- total etch technique + Fissure sealant Group8 : Single Bond Plus ( 3M ESPE ) - total etch technique + Fissure sealant Clinical assessment perform accord modify USPHS criterion 3 , 6 , 12 , 18 24 month . Retention , seconder caries , marginal adaptation marginal discoloration sealant evaluate . The data analyze statistically use Fisher 's Exact test Kaplan-Meier analysis .
